headline.main: A War Story That's Not Really About War

lead_paragraph: THE New Yorker ran a cartoon recently showing a couple watching television in their American living room. ''Baseball or anthrax?'' asks the one with the remote control.
abstract: In Love and War, Hallmark Hall of Fame production on CBS, is based on Eric Newby's 1971 memoir of his experiences as British soldier in Italy during World War II; photos (L)
snippet: THE New Yorker ran a cartoon recently showing a couple watching television in their American living room. ''Baseball or anthrax?'' asks the one with the remote control....
